alert.note: Alert for Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties; Washington Palouse (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 1:10PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Adams, northwestern Garfield, southwestern Whitman and southern Lincoln Counties through 145 PM PDT... At 109 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ritzville to near Turner. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ritzville, Ralston, Riparia, Hay, Pizzro, Marengo, Tokio, Dodge, Benge, Hooper, and La Crosse. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 in Washington between mile markers 220 and 231. U.S. Highway 12 in Washington between mile markers 389 and 395. U.S. Highway 395 in Washington between mile markers 90 and 96. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties; Washington Palouse
